Hello, I'm

Samuel Kiyoshi Nishizono-Miller

I am a recent Aerospace Engineering Graduate, having earned a First-Class Honours degree, I am eager to contribute to the industry. 　I have participated in projects such as the Aeolus 2 mock design as an mission engineer and the UKSEDS Olympus Rover Challenge where I lead the software team. My research project focused on hemispherical resonator gyroscopes. I hold a Master Certification in System Tool Kit (STK).
